amendment.description: To declare certain areas in Seward, Alaska, as nonnavigable waters of the United States for purposes of navigational servitude.

vote.text: Amendment SA 904 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 904 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Murkowski.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 904 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Murkowski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 904 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
